Package com.semedy.reasoner.reasoning.processes

Class Encoder

java.lang.Object
com.semedy.reasoner.reasoning.processes.Encoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Receiver
public class Encoder extends Object implements Receiver
Takes a package of input tuples and internalizes terms in it.
Used as post processor for built-ins.
Author:
angele
